page.title: 09TRADE - SHOPPING.
page.content: There are 5 shops in Cubert - a food store, a general store incorporating a sub-post office, a butcher's, a fish and chip shop and a petrol filling station with a 'mini-market'. These shops constitute ribbon development on the north side of the village street, and at each end there is a restaurant. Although these shops provide many of the daily needs of some local inhabitants, a large number of them prefer to shop in the nearby town of Newquay, 5 miles away, or the city of Truro l5 miles away. In Holywell there is a small food store and a cafeteria, the latter catering specifically for the holiday maker.
